    (a : ℕ → ℝ)
    (ha : ∀ n ≥ 1, 0 < a n ∧ a n ≤ a (2 * n) + a (2 * n + 1)) :

  have h₁ : ∀ n ≥ 1, 0 < a n := by

    exact (ha n hn).1
  have h₂ : ∀ n ≥ 1, a n ≤ a (2 * n) + a (2 * n + 1) := by

    exact (ha n hn).2

  have h₄ : Tendsto (fun N : ℕ => ∑ n : Set.Icc 1 N, a n) atTop atTop := by
    have h₅ : ∀ N : ℕ, ∑ n : Set.Icc 1 N, a n ≥ ∑ n : Set.Icc 1 N, (0 : ℝ) := by
      intro N

        intro N
        apply Finset.sum_le_sum
        intro n hn
        exact le_of_lt (h₁ n (Finset.mem_Icc.mp hn).1)
      exact tendsto_atTop_mono h₇ (tendsto_nat_cast_atTop_atTop)

  exact h₄

theorem putnam_1994_a1
    (a : ℕ → ℝ)
    (ha : ∀ n ≥ 1, 0 < a n ∧ a n ≤ a (2 * n) + a (2 * n + 1)) :
    Tendsto (fun N : ℕ => ∑ n : Set.Icc 1 N, a n) atTop atTop := by
  have h₁ : ∀ n ≥ 1, 0 < a n := by
    intro n hn
    exact (ha n hn).1
  have h₂ : ∀ n ≥ 1, a n ≤ a (2 * n) + a (2 * n + 1) := by
    intro n hn
    exact (ha n hn).2
  have h₃ : ∀ n ≥ 1, a n ≥ 0 := by
    intro n hn
    exact le_of_lt (h₁ n hn)
  have h₄ : ∀ N : ℕ, ∑ n in Set.Icc 1 N, a n ≥ ∑ n in Set.Icc 1 N, 0 := by
    intro N
    apply Finset.sum_le_sum
    intro n hn
    exact h₃ n (Finset.mem_Icc.mp hn).1
  simp at h₄
  have h₅ : Tendsto (fun N : ℕ => ∑ n : Set.Icc 1 N, a n) atTop atTop := by
    have h₆ : ∀ N : ℕ, ∑ n in Set.Icc 1 N, a n ≥ N := by
      intro N
      induction N with
      | zero => simp [h₁]
      | succ N ih =>
        simp_all [Finset.sum_Icc_succ_top, Nat.cast_add, Nat.cast_one, Nat.cast_zero, Nat.cast_succ]
        nlinarith [h₂ N (by linarith), h₁ N (by linarith), h₁ (2 * N) (by linarith), h₁ (2 * N + 1) (by linarith)]
    exact tendsto_atTop_mono h₆ tendsto_nat_cast_atTop_atTop
  exact h₅

    (a : ℕ → ℝ)
    (ha : ∀ n ≥ 1, 0 < a n ∧ a n ≤ a (2 * n) + a (2 * n + 1)) :

```lean4
theorem putnam_1994_a1
    (a : ℕ → ℝ)
    (ha : ∀ n ≥ 1, 0 < a n ∧ a n ≤ a (2 * n) + a (2 * n + 1)) :
    Tendsto (fun N : ℕ => ∑ n : Set.Icc 1 N, a n) atTop atTop := by
  have h₁ : ∀ n ≥ 1, 0 < a n := by
    intro n hn
    exact (ha n hn).1
  have h₂ : ∀ n ≥ 1, a n ≤ a (2 * n) + a (2 * n + 1) := by
    intro n hn
    exact (ha n hn).2
  have h₃ : ∀ n ≥ 1, a n ≥ 0 := by
    intro n hn
    exact le_of_lt (h₁ n hn)
  have h₄ : ∀ N : ℕ, ∑ n in Set.Icc 1 N, a n ≥ ∑ n in Set.Icc 1 N, 0 := by
    intro N
    apply Finset.sum_le_sum
    intro n hn
    exact h₃ n (by simp_all [Set.mem_Icc])
  simp at h₄
  have h₅ : Tendsto (fun N : ℕ => ∑ n : Set.Icc 1 N, a n) atTop atTop := by
    -- Use the fact that the series diverges by the given conditions
    have h₆ : ∀ N : ℕ, ∑ n in Set.Icc 1 N, a n ≥ N := by
      intro N
      induction N with
      | zero => simp_all
      | succ N ih =>
        simp_all [Finset.sum_Icc_succ_top, Nat.cast_add, Nat.cast_one, Nat.cast_zero, add_zero]
        nlinarith [h₁ N (by linarith), h₂ N (by linarith), ih]
    exact tendsto_atTop_mono h₆ tendsto_natCast_atTop_atTop
  exact h₅
